name: Green Bay Packers vs Chicago Bears  Live
short_description:
The Chicago Bears and Green Bay Packers take their legendary rivalry to Monday Night Football for Week 9. The kickoff for this game is set for 8:40 p.m. ET on ESPN.

Green Bay enters this divisional showdown atop the NFC North and riding a four-game winning streak. The Bears are coming off a bye in Week 8 after losing to the Washington Redskins the previous week.

Neither of these two teams enjoy each other's company, so there is little doubt that this should be a competitive game from start to finish. Stick along with us as we bring you live scores, updates and highlights throughout all the night's action
